Activity: Log in to the database and check the status of data collection from the previous day.
Collaborate with @Quality Assurance Tester to ensure proper testing of integrated data.
Review database performance metrics and identify any potential issues with data handling.
Assist @Help Desk Support in addressing any user-reported database issues.
Work on refining scripts necessary for ensuring database integrity during upcoming data collection periods.
Meeting with @Clinical Lead to discuss data collection parameters and clinical implications.
Review integration documentation with @EHR Integration Developer for any inconsistencies or errors.
Compile and document findings from the day’s work and send updates to the team.
